title: On barrier strategy dividends with Parisian implementation delay for classical surplus processes
abstract: In this paper, we apply a single barrier strategy to optimise dividend payments in the situation where there is a time lag d > 0 between decision and implementation. Using a classical surplus process with exponentially distributed jumps, we obtain the optimal barrier b* which maximises the expected present value of dividends
